extensionDescription.message: Always select the correct identity with Identity Selector!

optionsMessageInstallThankYou.message: Thank you for installing Identity Selector!

optionsMessageInstallOptions.message: Below you will find the available preferences.

optionsMessageUpdateThankYou.message: Thank you for updating Identity Selector!

optionsMessageUpdateOptions.message: Below you will find the available updated preferences.

optionsComposeWindowOnCancel.message: Close compose window when canceling identity selector window

errorSetComposeIdentity.message: Set identity for compose window failed: $1

confirmCreateIdentity.message:
The following new identity will be created:

Email address:	$1
In account:		$2

After creating the new identity the compose window will need to be closed and reopened for changes to take effect.

Do you want to create this new identity?

popupHeadingPotentialIdentities.message: Potential identity addresses for this account in original message

noticeMismatchedIdentity.message: The identity that the message $1 was sent to (preselected below) belongs to a different account ($2) than your current account ($3)!

noticeMissingIdentity.message: The message $1 was not sent to any of your existing identities! Perhaps it was sent to a catch-all address for which you have not created an identity yet.

noticeCreateIdentity.message: You can create a new identity by clicking on one of addresses in the list of found potential identity addresses below.
